item.title: Report E-2025010049
item.description:
Report E-2025010049

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-07T00:58:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-09
  • City: POMPANO BEACH
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 07:14 EST, ERTS was contacted by XPO Logistics (NPB) about a cargo release. It was reported that due to improper loading, approximately 5 pounds Royal Blend NP AE (hazardous - UN3262) was released. The caller stated that the released product was contained to the trailer and dock floor. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller and they felt comfortable cleaning the release donning the proper PPE per SDS (Nick Fletcher - Service Center Mgr. was advised the terminal wants to clean it themselves). The released product and damaged bag will be placed into a 5-gallon poly drum and staged in OS&D. There were no drains, soils or waterways reported to have been impacted by the release.

item.title: Report X-2024121349
item.description:
Report X-2024121349

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-01T21:13:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-27
  • City: FORT MYERS
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: ON December 26th 5 packages were found during the PM sort. The packages were retail packages of Diamond Strike-A-Fire, fire starter sticks. The 5 packages, from the same shipper, going to different consignees were stopped. An SDS was found for these and these are classified as UN1944, Matches, Safety, 4.1, III. There are no DG markings on the packages. The packages are being held pending investigation. Additional tracking numbers as follows: 283630215992, 283678426750, 283630255426, 283630228124
